entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Carmacks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Carmacks 11:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -37.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -41.1°C
Wind: WNW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
